name: persia
description:
"persia" is the 2nd song off my new beattape "souls" releaseing August 27, 2021. The song was inspired by an album I found digging for records in a shop in Shanghai. It was a Persian record that was composed by a Japanese duo. I listened to the music and knew right away that I was going to buy it and sample it when I get home. 

the cover art was generated by AI using the text prompt "ancient adventures to the East" My girlfriend recommended prompt and the AI spit out a perfect piece. 

Bop your head and enjoy the music. If you purchase this piece, hit me up on twitter @ryanartwalker and I will send you the album with high quality WAV files!
